74|24|eviṭa meya pævata ena hūniyamak misa næta
74|25|meya minisāgē prakāśayak misa nætæyi” ohu pævasuvēya
74|26|mama ohu sakar(nam niraya)ṭa matu ætuḷat karami
74|27|sakar yanu kumakdæ?yi num̆baṭa dænum dunnē kumak da
74|28|eya (kisivak) itiri nokarayi. tavada at hæra nodamayi
74|29|sama dæḍi lesa davālannaki
74|30|ē mata dahanava deneki
74|31|nirayē sagayin malakvarun misa (venat aya) api pat nokaḷemu. deviyan pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa movungē saṁkhyāva parīkṣaṇayak lesin misa api pat nokaḷemu. eya dēva grantha denu læbūvan sthāvaratvayaṭa pat vanu piṇisatya. tavada deviyan kerehi viśvāsaya tæbūvangē viśvāsaya vardhanaya karanu piṇisat dēva grantha denu læbūvan hā deviyan kerehi viśvāsaya tæbūvan sæka nokaranu piṇisatya. emenma "memagin upamāvak lesin allāh adahas karanuyē kumakdæ"yi tama sit tuḷa rōga ætivun hā deviyan gæna pratikṣēpa kaḷavun pavasanu piṇisatya. elesa allāh taman abhimata karana aya nomaga yavayi. tavada taman abhimata karana ayaṭa maga penvayi. num̆bagē paramādhipatigē sēnāva gæna ohu hæra venat kisivek nodanī. meya minisunaṭa menehi kirīmak misa næta
74|32|esē nova san̆du mata divuramin
74|33|rātriya gevī yana viṭa eya mata divuramin
74|34|aruṇōdaya udā vana viṭa eya mata divuramin
74|35|niyata vaśayenma eya (niraya) balavat dæyin ekaki
74|36|minisāṭa anaturu an̆gavannak vaśayeni
74|37|eya num̆balā aturin peraṭa yāmaṭa hō pasubæsa ræn̆dennaṭa kæmati aya venuveni
74|38|sǣma ātmayakma taman upayā gat dǣ venuven æpakaruveku lesa siṭinnēya
74|39|namut dakuṇupasa janayā hæra
74|40|ovun svarga uyan mata siṭa vimasati
74|41|væradi karuvangen (mesē praśna karana ladi)
74|42|num̆balā sakar tuḷaṭa gena āvē kumakda
74|43|api salāt iṭu karannan aturin novūyemu" yæyi ovuhu pævasūha
74|44|tavada api diḷin̆dunṭa āhāra sapayamin nosiṭiyemu
74|45|(niṣphala kaṭayutu vala) gilī siṭinnan samaga apada gilī siṭiyemu
74|46|tavada api viniścaya dinaya boru karamin siṭiyemu
74|47|sthīra dǣ (maraṇaya) apa veta pæmiṇena tek
74|48|eheyin mædihatvannangē mædihatvīma ovunaṭa phalak novannēya
74|49|eheyin ovunaṭa kumak vī da? ovun menehi kirīma piṭudakinnēya
74|50|ovun tæti gat būruvan meni
74|51|siṁha godurin palā yana (vana satun meni)
74|52|esē nova digu harina lada patrikāvan tamanṭa da denu læbiya yutu yæyi ovun aturin sǣma kenekuma apēkṣā karanu æta
74|53|esē nova ovun matu lova piḷiban̆da biya noveti
74|54|esē nova niyata vaśayenma eya upadesaki
74|55|eheyin kavareku abhimata karannē da ohu eyin upades labatvā
74|56|allāh abhimata karannē nam misa ovuhu upades nolabati. ohu bætimatkama labannaṭa sudussāya. emenma samāva dāyāda karannaṭa da sudussāya
75|1|maḷavun keren nægiṭuvanu labana dinaya mata divurā pavasami
75|2|tavada taman mata avalāda nagana ātmaya mata divurami
75|3|ohugē asthi api ekræs nokarannēma yæyi minisā sitannēda
75|4|esē nova ohugē æn̆gili tuḍu pavā sakas kirīmaṭa api śaktivantayin vemu
75|5|namut minisā ohu idiriyē pāpayan kirīmaṭa sitayi
75|6|“maḷavun keren nægiṭuvanu labana dinaya kavadā dæ”yi ohu vimasā siṭiyi
75|7|dṛṣṭiya (nīlaṁkāravī) muḷāvī giya viṭa
75|8|tavada san̆du(gē alōkaya) gilunu viṭa
75|9|tavada hiru hā san̆du ek karanu læbū viṭa
75|10|palā yana tæna kotænadæyi edina minisā vimasanu æta
75|11|esē nova saraṇa patana tænak (ohuṭa) nomæta
75|12|edina vāsasthānaya num̆bagē paramādhipati veta pihiṭayi
75|13|ohu kalin kaḷa dǣ hā ohu pramāda koṭa kaḷa dǣ sambandhayen edina minisāṭa danvanu læbē
75|14|esē nova, taman gæna minisā sākṣi darannēya
75|15|ohu samāvaṭa hētūn idiripat kaḷa da
75|16|eya (kurānaya kiyavīmaṭa) ikman karanu piṇisa num̆bagē diva eyin nosolvanu
75|17|eya gonu kirīma da eya pārāyanaya karavīma da niyata vaśayenma apa veta vū vagakīmaki
75|18|eheyin api eya pārāyanaya kaḷa viṭa num̆ba ehi pārāyanaya anugamanaya karanu
75|19|pasu va eya pæhædili kirīma da niyata vaśayenma apa veta pævaruṇu vagakīmaki
75|20|namut num̆balā melova priya karannehuya
75|21|tavada num̆balā matu lova ata hæra damannehuya
75|22|edina ætæm muhuṇu dīptimatva pavatī
75|23|tama paramādhipati desa balamin siṭiti
75|24|tavada edina ætæm muhuṇu (an̆durin veḷī) virūpa va pavatī
75|25|kon̆du æṭa peḷa kaḍā damana yamak eyaṭa sidu karanu labanu ætæyi sitati
75|26|esē nova (prāṇaya) uguru daṇḍa dakvā ḷan̆gā vū viṭa
75|27|tavada ārakṣā karannā kavurun dæyi vimasanu læbu viṭa
75|28|niyata vaśayenma taman ven va yǣma eya vē yæyi ohu sitū viṭa
75|29|keṇḍaya keṇḍaya samaga æmuṇunu viṭa
75|30|edina meheya vanu labana sthānaya num̆bagē paramādhipati vetaya
75|31|tavada ohu satya tahavuru kaḷē næta. tavada ohu salātaya iṭu kaḷē da næta
75|32|namut ohu boru kaḷēya. tavada piṭupǣvēya
75|33|pasu va ohu tama pavula veta ahaṁkārakam pāmin giyēya
75|34|num̆baṭa khēdayayi. num̆baṭa khēdayamayi
75|35|pasu va da num̆baṭa khēdayayi! num̆baṭa khēdayamayi
75|36|nikaruṇē ohu ata hæra damanu labanu ætæyi minisā sitannē da
75|37|vidinu labana śukrāṇu bin̆duvak lesa ohu nosiṭiyē da
75|38|pasu va ohu ellī pavatina lē kæṭiyak bavaṭa pat viya. pasu va ohu mavā sækasuvēya
75|39|pasu va eyin striya hā pirimiyā yana yugalaya æti kaḷēya
75|40|(mē siyalu dē kaḷa) ohu, maḷavun nægiṭuvīmaṭa hækiyāva ættā bavaṭa (sākṣiyak lesa) pihiṭā nomæti da
76|1|minisā veta nisækavama kālayak pæmiṇa tibē, ehi ohu gæna (mesē yæyi ) pavasannaṭa taram vastuvak lesa (minisā) nosiṭiyēya
76|2|niyata vaśayenma musu vū śukrāṇu bin̆duvakin api minisā mævvemu. api ohu parīkṣaṇayaṭa lak karannemu. eheyin api ohu savan diya hæki hā bæliya hæki keneku bavaṭa pat kaḷemu
76|3|ema mārgaya veta niyata vaśayenma api ohuṭa maga penvūyemu. ohu kṛtavēdiyeku lesa hō guṇamakuveku lesa hō siṭiya hæka
76|4|niyata vaśayenma api deviyan pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa damvæl da gela vilaṁgu da æviḷena ginna da sūdānam kaḷemu
76|5|niyata vaśayenma dæhæmiyō ehi kapuru miśræti (kusalāna men vū) bhājana valin pānaya karati
76|6|(eya) ulpataki. emagin allāhgē gættan pānaya karati. eya ovun (kæmæti tænakaṭa nadiyak sē) galā yannaṭa salasvati
76|7|ovuhu (tamangē) bhāraya iṭu karati. tavada ehi hāniya pætira pavatina dinayaṭa ovuhu biya veti
76|8|tavada ē (āhāra) kerehi vū ælmak (ovun tuḷa tibunada) diḷindāṭa da anāthayāṭa da sirakaruvāṭa da ovuhu āhāra sapayati
76|9|“api num̆balāṭa āhāra sapayanuyē allāhgē tṛptiya venuveni. num̆balāgen kisidu pratiphalayak hō kisidu tuti pidumak hō api apēkṣā nokaramu” (yæyi pavasati)
76|10|apagē paramādhipati vetin muhuṇehi aprasanna hā piḷikula vidahā pāna dinayakaṭa niyata vaśayenma api biyavemu
76|11|eheyin allāh edina napuren ovun mudavā gannēya. tavada satuṭa hā somnasa ovun hamuvannaṭa salasannēya
76|12|ovun ivasā siṭi bævin svarga uyana hā sēda redi ovunaṭa ohu pratiphala vaśayen pirinæmuvēya
76|13|ovuhu ædan mata hānsivemin siṭiti. ovuhu ehi hiru raśmiya hō adhika sītala hō nodakinu æta
76|14|tavada ehi hevaṇa ovun mata pahat va pavatī. valu bara palaturu pokuruda ehi ellī pavatī
76|15|ridiyen vū bhājana hā paḷin̆gu valin yut gurulēttu rægena ovun vaṭā gaman karavanu labati
76|16|eya ridiyen vū paḷin̆guya. ovuhu ehi pramāṇaya sakas kara gannōya
76|17|sanjabīl (in̆guru) miśræti pānayen yut kusalāna ehi ovunaṭa pānaya san̆dahā denu labati
76|18|ehi salsabīl yæyi han̆dunvanu labana ulpatakda veyi
76|19|sadā yauvanayē pasu vana daruvan ovun vaṭā yati. num̆ba ovun duṭu viṭa eya visiranu læbū mutu yæyi sitanu æta
76|20|tavada num̆ba ehi duṭu viṭa atiśaya prītiya hā viśāla rājyayak lesa num̆ba dakinu æta
76|21|sinin̆du hā koḷa pæhæti ghana sēda æn̆galum ovun mata veyi. ovunaṭa ridiyen vū vaḷalu palann̆davanu labati. tavada ovungē paramādhipati ovunaṭa pirisidu pānaya sapayanu æta
76|22|niyata vaśayenma meya num̆balā san̆dahā vū pratiphalayak viya. tavada num̆balāgē utsāhaya tuti puda karanu labannak viya
76|23|niyata vaśayenma al kurānaya api num̆ba veta koṭas vaśayen pahaḷa kaḷemu
76|24|eheyin num̆bagē paramādhipatigē nītiya venuven ivasīmen siṭinu. ovun aturin kisidu pāpiyekuṭa hō deviyan pratikṣēpa kaḷa kisidu ayakuṭa hō num̆ba avanata novanu
76|25|tavada udē savasa num̆bē paramādhipatigē nāmaya suviśuddha karanu
76|26|tavada rātriyēdī ohuṭa sujūd karanu. tavada rātriyēdī digu vēlāvak num̆ba ohu suviśuddha karanu
76|27|niyata vaśayenma ovuhu melovaṭa priya karati. namut ovunaṭa pasu va æti bærǣrum dinaya ata hæra damati
76|28|api ovun mævvemu. tavada ovungē handipat śaktimat kaḷemu. tavada apa abhimata kaḷē nam ovun venuvaṭa ovun men vūvan api venas koṭa pat karannemu
76|29|niyata vaśayenma meya upadesaki. eheyin kavareku abhimata karannē da tama paramādhipati veta mārgayak lesa ganitvā
76|30|allāh abhimata karannē nam misa num̆balā abhimata nokarannehuya. niyata vaśayenma allāh sarva gnānīya. ati siyum gnānavantaya
76|31|ohu abhimata karana aya ohugē karuṇāva tuḷaṭa ætuḷat karanu æta. tavada aparādhakaruvan vanāhi ovunaṭa vēdanīya dan̆ḍuvamak ohu sūdānam kara æta
77|1|akhaṇḍa va evanu labana suḷaṁ mata divuramin
77|2|dæḍi lesa hamana sæḍa suḷaṁ mata divuramin
77|3|(valāvan) visiruvā harina suḷaṁ mata divuramin
77|4|ven ven va ven karana dǣ mata divuramin
77|5|menehi kirīmak vaśayen (hadavataṭa) heḷana dǣ mata divuramin
77|6|(ema menehi kirīma) samāvak vaśayen nætahot avavādayak vaśayen hō pavatī
77|7|niyata vaśayenma num̆balāṭa pratignā denu labana dǣ siduvannaki
77|8|taru ehi ālōkaya makā damanu labana viṭa
77|9|tavada ahasa pupurā harinu labana viṭa
77|10|kan̆du dūvili bavaṭa pat karanu labana viṭa
77|11|tavada dharma dūtavarun ek ræs karanu labana viṭa
77|12|kavara dinayak san̆dahā meya kal damanu laddē da
77|13|(eya) viniścaya dinaya san̆dahāya
77|14|viniścaya dinaya yanu kumakdæyi num̆baṭa dænum dunnē kumak da
77|15|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|16|mula siṭiyavun api vināśa nokaḷemu da
77|17|pasu va api ovun samaga pasu pæmiṇiyavun da anugamanaya kaḷemu
77|18|aparādhakaruvanṭa api sidu karanuyē elesaya
77|19|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|20|itā pahat vū drāvaṇayakin api num̆balā nomævvemu da
77|21|eviṭa ārakṣita sthānayaka api eya tænpat kaḷemu
77|22|niyamita kāla paricchēdayak dakvā
77|23|esēma apima eya niyama kaḷemu. eheyin api niyama karannangen viśiṣṭayan vemu
77|24|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|25|mahapoḷova pramāṇavat lesa api pat nokaḷemu da
77|26|jīvat vannanṭa hā maḷavunṭa
77|27|tavada ehi api us kan̆du mudun æti kaḷemu. tavada imihiri jalayada pevvemu
77|28|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|29|num̆balā kavara deyak boru karamin siṭiyē da ē vetaṭa num̆balā gaman karanu
77|30|śākhā tunakin samanvita hevaṇa veta gaman karanu
77|31|eya hevaṇa labā dennak lesin næta. emenma eya gini dællen ārakṣā karannak da noveyi
77|32|niyata vaśayenma eya māligā men (usaṭa) daruṇu lesa gini dæl heḷayi
77|33|eya kaha pæhæti oṭu raṁcuvak men pavatī
77|34|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|35|eya ovun katā nokarana dinayaki
77|36|ovun nidahasaṭa karuṇu idiripat kirīma san̆dahā ovunaṭa anumætiya denu nolæbē
77|37|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|38|meya viniścayē dinayayi. api num̆balā hā mutun mittan ek ræs kaḷemu
77|39|eheyin num̆balāṭa yam kumantraṇayak tibē nam num̆balā maṭa kumantraṇaya karanu
77|40|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|41|niyata vaśayenma biya bætimatun hevaṇa hā ulpat atara veti
77|42|tavada ovun āśā karana palaturu atara da (veti)
77|43|num̆balā sidu karamin siṭi dǣ hētuven num̆balā sæpasē anubhava karanu. tavada pānaya karanu (yæyi kiyanu læbē)
77|44|niyata vaśayenma melesaya api dæhæmiyanṭa pratiphala pirinamanuyē
77|45|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|46|num̆balā anubhava karanu. tavada mada kalak bhukti vin̆dinu. niyata vaśayenma num̆balā aparādhakaruvanya
77|47|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|48|(melovehi) ovunaṭa (daṇin allamin nævī) rukūu karannæyi pavasanu labana viṭa ovuhu rukūu nokarati
77|49|boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
77|50|min pasu va ovun viśvāsa karanuyē kavara prakāśayak da
78|1|(nabivaraya) kumak piḷiban̆dava da ovun taman atara vimasā siṭinuyē
78|2|mahan̆gu vū āraṁciya piḷiban̆dava ya
78|3|eya ovun bhēda binna vī siṭi dǣya
78|4|noesēya. ovuhu matu dæna gannōya
78|5|yaḷi noesēya. ovuhu matu dæna gannōya
78|6|api mahapoḷova ætirillak lesa pat nokaḷemu da
78|7|tavada kan̆du, kūñña lesa da (pat nokaḷemu da)
78|8|tavada api num̆balā va (strī puruṣa lesa) yugala vaśayen nomævvemu da
78|9|tavada api num̆balāgē ninda vivēkayak bavaṭa pat nokaḷemu da
78|10|tavada api rātriya āvaraṇayak bavaṭa pat nokaḷemu da
78|11|tavada api dahavala jīvanōpāya (salasā gannak) bavaṭa pat nokaḷemu da
78|12|tavada api num̆balāṭa ihaḷin śaktimat (ahas) hatak idi nokaḷemu da
78|13|tavada api dīptiyen dælvena pahanak bavaṭa (sūryayā) pat nokaḷemu da
78|14|tavada api mēgha valāvangen (væsi) jalaya adhika lesa pahaḷa nokaḷemu da
78|15|emagin dhānya (varga) hā vṛkṣalatā da haṭa ganu piṇisa
78|16|turu patarin gahana (sarusāra) uyan da (haṭa ganu piṇisa)
78|17|niyata vaśayenma tīraṇātmaka dinayaṭa (adāḷa) kālaya niyama vī æta
78|18|sūr (horaṇǣva) pim̆binu labana dinayē dī num̆balā kaṇḍāyam vaśayen pæmiṇenu æta
78|19|tavada ahasa vivṛta karanu læbē. eviṭa eya doraṭu bavaṭa pat vanu æta
78|20|kan̆du (tibū tæn valin) ivat karanu læbē. eviṭa eya mirin̆guvak men vanu æta
78|21|niyata vaśayenma niraya pahara dena sthānayak viya
78|22|(eya) sīmāva ikmavā yannavun san̆dahā navātænak vaśayeni
78|23|ehi ovuhu yuga gaṇanāvakma veseti
78|24|ovuhu ehi sisila hō pānaya hō rasa novin̆diti
78|25|naṭana uṇu diya saha (nirayē væsiyangē vaṇa) særava misa. (vena kisivak næta)
78|26|(esē ovunaṭa læbenuyē) sudusu pratiphalayak vaśayeni
78|27|niyata vaśayenma ovuhu viniścaya apēkṣā nokaramin siṭiyaha
78|28|tavada ovuhu apagē vadan dæḍi lesa boru yæyi pavasamin pratikṣēpa kaḷōya
78|29|tavada api sǣma deyakma likhita va lēkhaṇayehi saṭahan kaḷemu
78|30|“ebævin num̆balā rasa vin̆dinu. eviṭa kisiviṭeka dan̆ḍuvama misa (an kisivak) api num̆balāṭa væḍi nokarannemu.” (yæyi nirayē væsiyanṭa pavasanu læbē)
78|31|niyata vaśayenma biya bætimatunṭa jayagrahaṇaya da æta
78|32|vatu hā midi da (æta)
78|33|tavada piyayuru nerā giya sama vayasē kanyāvan da (siṭiti)
78|34|(pānavalin) piruṇu kusalāna da æta
78|35|niṣphala kathā bahak hō (ovunovun atara) kisidu boru kirīmak hō ehi ovuhu śravaṇaya nokarati
78|36|(eya) num̆bagē paramādhipatigen vū pramāṇavat dāyādayak vana pratiphalayaki
78|37|(eya) ahashi da mahapoḷovehi da ē deka atara pavatina dǣhi da paramādhipatiyāṇan vana aparimita dayānvitayāṇangeni. (ohu idiriyē) kathā kirīmaṭa ohugen ovun (kisiveku)ṭa balaya nomæta
78|38|rūh (jibrīl) hā malak (dēvadūta)varun peḷa gæsī nægiṭa siṭina dina. (edina) aparimita dayānvitayā anumætiya dun keneku hā satya dǣ kathā karanneku misa (an kisivek) kathā nokarayi
78|39|eyamaya satyaya vū dinayayi. ebævin yamek abhimata karannēda ohu tama rab (paramādhipati) veta āpasu yana mārgaya tōrā ganitvā
78|40|niyata vaśayenma samīpayen pavatina dan̆ḍuvama piḷiban̆da va api num̆balāṭa avavāda kaḷemu. edina minisā tama deat peraṭu kaḷa dǣ dæka ganī. tavada pratikṣēpa karannā, “ahō ! mā pas bavaṭa pat viya yutu novem dæ”yi pavasayi
79|1|sāhasika lesa (duṣṭayangē prāṇaya) galavannan mata divuramin
79|2|tavada mṛdu lesa galavannan mata da divuramin
79|3|(kæruṇika kriyāvanhi) pāvemin pihinannan mata da divuramin
79|4|taran̆gakārī lesa taran̆ga vadinnan mata da (divuramin)
79|5|tavada kaṭayutu sælasum karannan mata da (divuramin)
79|6|edina mahat kampanayakin (lova) kampanaya vē
79|7|eyaṭa anupiḷiveḷin kampanaya nævata sidu vanu æta
79|8|edina hadavat (biyen) tæti ganiyi
79|9|ovungē bælma biyen pavatī
79|10|“niyata vaśayenma api pera tattvayaṭama nævata haravanu labannnō vannemudæ” yi ovuhu pavasati
79|11|“apa dirā giya asthi bavaṭa patvūyē nam da?”
79|12|“esē nam eya alābhavanta hærīmaki” yæyi ovuhu pavasati
79|13|ehet eya ek bhayānaka han̆ḍak pamaṇi
79|14|eviṭa ovuhu (viniścaya san̆dahā) eḷimahan tænaka siṭiti
79|15|mūsāgē toraturu (nabivaraya) obaṭa læbuṇēda
79|16|ohugē paramādhipati ohu va tuvā nam pāriśuddha nimnayehi æmatū viṭa
79|17|oba firavun veta yanu. niyata vaśayenma ohu sīmāva ikmavā gos æta
79|18|eviṭa oba pivituru vīmaṭa obaṭa (kæmættak) ætdæyi vimasanu
79|19|tavada mā num̆baṭa man̆ga penvannemi. eviṭa num̆ba num̆bagē paramādhipatiṭa biyabætimat veyi
79|20|eviṭa ohu (mūsā) ohuṭa mahā saḷakuṇa penvīya
79|21|namut ohu (firavun eya)boru yæyi pavasā (ohuṭa)piṭupǣvēya
79|22|pasu va (ohugen ven vī) pasu bæsa gos (ohuṭa hāni kirīmaṭa) vǣyam kaḷēya
79|23|eviṭa ohu (ohugē janayā) ræs koṭa (ovun va) æmatuvēya
79|24|eviṭa “mama num̆balāgē usas paramādhipati vemi“ yæyi ohu pævasuvēya
79|25|eheyin allāh melova hā paralova dan̆ḍuvamaṭa ohu va hasu kara gattēya
79|26|niyata vaśayenma (allāhṭa) biyavannekuṭa ehi pāḍamak æta
79|27|mævīmaṭa balavat vannē num̆balā da nætahot ahasa da? eya ohu(allāh) nirmāṇaya kaḷēya
79|28|ohu ehi viyana osavā pasu va eya niværadi va sækasuvēya
79|29|tavada ohu ehi rātriya (an̆duren) āvaraṇaya kara ehi dahavala heḷi kaḷēya
79|30|tavada mahapoḷova in pasuva (niyamākārayen) ohu eya diga hæriyēya
79|31|ohu eyin ehi æti jalaya da ehi æti taṇabim da bihi kaḷēya
79|32|tavada kan̆du eya ohu sthāvarava sthāpita kaḷēya
79|33|(eya) num̆balāṭa hā num̆balāgē govipaḷa satunṭa bhukti vin̆dīmak vaśayeni
79|34|ehet mahat vyasanaya pæmiṇi viṭa
79|35|edina minisā taman (melova) prayatna dærū dǣ sihipat karannēya
79|36|tavada naram̆bannanhaṭa niraya pratyakṣa karanu labayi

104|5|hutamā va yanu kumakdæ yi num̆balā dænuvat kaḷē kumakda
104|6|eya avuḷanu læbū allāhgē ginnaya
104|7|eya sit mata ebikam karayi
104|8|sæbævinma eya ovun vaṭa kara gannaki
104|9|us kulunu tuḷa (hirakara)
105|1|num̆bagē paramādhipati æt sēnāva saman̆ga kaṭayutu kaḷē kesēdæ yi num̆ba nuduṭuvehida
105|2|ovungē kumantraṇaya muḷā kirīmehi pat nokaḷēda
105|3|tavada ohu ovun mata raṁcu vaśayen kurullan evvēya
105|4|un ovun mata pulussana lada mæṭi valin vū gal heḷuvēya
105|5|eviṭa ovun va kā damana lada piduru men ohu pat kaḷēya
106|1|kureyiṣvarunhaṭa hurupurudukam æti kirīma venuven da
106|2|śīta hā grīṣma ṛtuvan hi (vyāpāra kaṭayutu san̆dahā) tavalamehi yǣmaṭa ovunhaṭa hurupurudukam æti kirīma venuven da
106|3|mema nivasē paramādhipatiṭa ovun næmadum karatvā
106|4|kusaginnen (siṭi) ovunaṭa āhāra pirinamā biyen (siṭi) ovunaṭa ārakṣāva pirinæmuvē ohuya
107|1|viniścaya dinaya boru karana aya num̆ba duṭuvehi da
107|2|enam ohu kavarekda yat anāthayā va palavā hariyi
107|3|tavada duppatāgē āhāraya (labā dīma) piḷiban̆da va diri noganvayi
107|4|emenma salātaya iṭu karannanhaṭa vināśaya at vēvā
107|5|ovuhu kavarahu da yat ovuhu tamangē salātaya piḷiban̆da va sælakillak dakvannō novūha
107|6|an ayaṭa penvā (purasāram doḍa)nnan vūha
107|7|novaṭinā alpa vastūn (piri næmīma) pavā vaḷakvannō vūha
108|1|niyata vaśayenma api num̆baṭa asīmita sampat pirinæmuvemu
108|2|ebævin num̆ba num̆bagē paramādhipatiṭa salātaya iṭu kara num̆ba (allāh venuvenma) satekugē gela kapā harinu
108|3|niyata vaśayenma num̆baṭa dos pavarannā vana ohumaya peḷapata nomættā
109|1|(nabi muhammad) pavasanu ahō dēva pratikṣēpakayini
109|2|num̆balā namadina dǣ mama nonamadimi

109|6|num̆balāṭa num̆balāgē dahamaya. maṭa māgē dahamaya
110|1|allāhgē upakāraya hā (makkā) jayagrahaṇaya pæmiṇi viṭada
110|2|tavada allāhgē dahamaṭa janayā kaṇḍāyam vaśayen pivisenu num̆ba dakina viṭa da
110|3|num̆ba num̆bagē paramādhipatigē praśaṁsāva tuḷin ohu va pivituru karanu. tavada ohugen samāva ayæda siṭinu. niyata vaśayenma ohu atikṣamāśīlī viya
111|1|abū lahabgē dǣt vināśa vēvā! ohu da vināśa vēvā
111|2|ohugē dhanaya da ohu ipæyū dǣ da ohuṭa phalak gena dunnē næta
111|3|matuvaṭa ohu agni jālāven yut nirayaṭa pivisa dævenu æta
111|4|(ohu da) dara usulanniyak vū ohugē biriya da (agni jālāven yut nirayaṭa pivisa dævenu æta)

112|1|(nabi muhammad) pavasanu. ohu enam allāh ēkīyaya

112|4|tavada ohuṭa samāna kisiveku novīya
